response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than $80. However, I'm willing to start our negotiation at $100. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and expertise put into creating something truly special. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this offer and discuss any concerns you might have. Let's make this a win-win situation!", "product_price": 100}
